# outlineOverlay

**Type Property**

A built-in selection style that draws the outline of the scrubber item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var outlineOverlay: NSScrubberSelectionStyle { get }
```

## Using built-in styles

- **roundedBackground**: A built-in selection style that draws a rounded rectangle as the background of the scrubber item.
